page.title: 15MEDIA
page.content: The results of my survey on{Media} show that nearly{50%}of all house's take a daily newspaper.The most popular being the{Times}the{Telegragh} the{Daily Express}and the{Sun.}Most of these are obtained or delivered after normal breakfast time. { 48%}of the people in my area have got {1 or 2}radios and{24%}of people have got{3 or 4}radios. { 32%}of all households travel into Ross to the main library,but only{4% {have}books from the travelling library.The most popular books chosen appear to be{Romance,True Life,Terror and{Comedies. Surprisingly only {75% }of homes have a television and only{half}have a{tele {phone}although most have access to a public telephone less than a kilometre away.Magazines,weekly and monthly are popular covering many interests.
